comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "Planning a stay at the coast are Mrs. Roy Lett, left, and Mrs. Jim Harvey, who's holding her son, Bryce. Their children Janice Harvey, Jean Fain and Roy Lett Jr., insist that all their favorite toys and clothes must accompany them."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 24391992@N00
comment._content: Great memories on summer vacations to the beach.
